All_Objects.description: Matching everything that has a `type` which **IS** an `object`
All_Objects.name: All_Objects

All_ObjectsWithTitle.description: Matching all `objects` defined with a `title` property
All_ObjectsWithTitle.name: All_ObjectsWithTitle

All_NonObjects.description: Matching everything that has a `type` which is **NOT** an `object`
All_NonObjects.name: All_NonObjects

simpleType-validation-EquipmentReference.name: simpleType-validation-EquipmentReference
simpleType-validation-EquipmentReference.description:
The `equipmentReference` **MUST** be:
* type: `string`
* maxLength: `11`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

simpleType-validation-Weight.name: simpleType-validation-Weight
simpleType-validation-Weight.description:
The `weight` **MUST** have:
* type: `number`
* format: `float`
* minimum: `0`
* exclusiveMinimum: `true`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

simpleType-validation-Volume.name: simpleType-validation-Volume
simpleType-validation-Volume.description:
The `volume` **MUST** be:
* type: `number`
* format: `float`
* minimum: `0`
* exclusiveMinimum: `true`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

simpleType-validation-WeightUnit.name: simpleType-validation-WeightUnit
simpleType-validation-WeightUnit.description:
The `weightUnit` **MUST** have:
* type: `string`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

simpleType-validation-string-type-must-h.name: simpleType-validation-string-type-must-have-example
simpleType-validation-string-type-must-h.message: SimpleTypes of type: `string` must have an example

simpleType-validation-VolumeUnit.name: simpleType-validation-VolumeUnit
simpleType-validation-VolumeUnit.description:
The `volumeUnit` **MUST** have:
* type: `string`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

simpleType-validation-CarrierBookingRefe.name: simpleType-validation-CarrierBookingReference
simpleType-validation-CarrierBookingRefe.description:
The `carrierBookingReference` **MUST** be:
* type: `string`
* pattern: `^\S+(\s+\S+)*$`
* maxLength: `35`
* cannot be defined using a $ref

x-embeddedFunctions.name: noRefInSimpleType
equals
